abstract: The app’s ability to schedule and receive local and remote notifications.
overview:
## Discussion

When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.usernotifications/documentation/UserNotifications/UNAuthorizationStatus/authorized], your app is allowed to schedule and receive local and remote notifications. When authorized, use the [doc://com.apple.usernotifications/documentation/UserNotifications/UNNotificationSettings/alertSetting], [doc://com.apple.usernotifications/documentation/UserNotifications/UNNotificationSettings/badgeSetting], and [doc://com.apple.usernotifications/documentation/UserNotifications/UNNotificationSettings/soundSetting] properties to specify which types of interactions are allowed. When the value of the property is [doc://com.apple.usernotifications/documentation/UserNotifications/UNAuthorizationStatus/denied], the system doesn’t deliver notifications to your app, and the system ignores any attempts to schedule local notifications.

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.usernotifications/documentation/UserNotifications/UNAuthorizationStatus/notDetermined] if your app has never requested authorization using the [doc://com.apple.usernotifications/documentation/UserNotifications/UNUserNotificationCenter/requestAuthorization(options:completionHandler:)] method.

# authorizationStatus

**Instance Property**

The app’s ability to schedule and receive local and remote notifications.

## Declaration

```swift
var authorizationStatus: UNAuthorizationStatus { get }
```

## Discussion

When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.usernotifications/documentation/UserNotifications/UNAuthorizationStatus/authorized], your app is allowed to schedule and receive local and remote notifications. When authorized, use the [doc://com.apple.usernotifications/documentation/UserNotifications/UNNotificationSettings/alertSetting], [doc://com.apple.usernotifications/documentation/UserNotifications/UNNotificationSettings/badgeSetting], and [doc://com.apple.usernotifications/documentation/UserNotifications/UNNotificationSettings/soundSetting] properties to specify which types of interactions are allowed. When the value of the property is [doc://com.apple.usernotifications/documentation/UserNotifications/UNAuthorizationStatus/denied], the system doesn’t deliver notifications to your app, and the system ignores any attempts to schedule local notifications.

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.usernotifications/documentation/UserNotifications/UNAuthorizationStatus/notDetermined] if your app has never requested authorization using the [doc://com.apple.usernotifications/documentation/UserNotifications/UNUserNotificationCenter/requestAuthorization(options:completionHandler:)] method.

## Getting the Authorization Status

- **UNAuthorizationStatus**: Constants indicating whether the app is allowed to schedule notifications.
